    • Method Detail

      • newImage

        Image newImage(java.lang.String fileName,
             Graphics.ImageFormat format)
        Creates a new image with a specified file name and of a given file format.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name to be given to the created image.
        format - File format of the created image.
        Returns:
        image with a specified file name and of a given file format.

      • clearScreen

        void clearScreen(int color)
        Sets the entire screen to a single colour.
        Parameters:
        color - the colour to set the screen to.

      • drawLine

        void drawLine(int x,
            int y,
            int x2,
            int y2,
            int color)
        Draws a line of a specified colour on the screen.
        Parameters:
        x - starting x coordinate of the line.
        y - starting y coordinate of the line.
        x2 - terminating x coordinate of the line.
        y2 - terminating y coordinate of the line.
        color - colour of the line to be drawn.

      • drawRect

        void drawRect(int x,
            int y,
            int width,
            int height,
            int color)
        Draws a rectangle of a a specified size and colour to the screen.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of origin of the rectangle.
        y - y coordinate of origin of the rectangle.
        width - width of the rectangle.
        height - height of the rectangle.
        color - color of the rectangle.

        Draws an image to the screen.
        Parameters:
        image - Image to be drawn.
        x - x coordinate to draw image.
        y - y coordinate to draw image.
        srcX -
        srcY -
        srcWidth - width of the source image.
        srcHeight - height of the source image.

      • drawImage

             int x,
             int y)
        Draws an image to the screen.
        Parameters:

        y - y coordinate to draw image.

      • drawString

        void drawString(java.lang.String text,
              int x,
              int y,
              Paint paint)
        Draws some text to the screen.
        Parameters:
        text - text to be drawn to screen.
        x - x coordinate to draw text.
        y - y coordinate to draw text.
        paint - Paint object with which to draw text to screen.

        int getHeight()

      • drawARGB

        void drawARGB(int i,
            int j,
            int k,
            int l)
        Draws a colour of a specified colour and transparency.
        Parameters:
        i - alpha value of colour.
        j - red value of colour.
        k - green value of colour.
        l - blue value of colour.
